title: Keras vs LlamaIndex: Which AI Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare Keras vs LlamaIndex. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between Keras and LlamaIndex? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Keras vs LlamaIndex
paragraphs: Keras (ml frameworks) is High-level neural-network API offering fast experimentation on top of TensorFlow, JAX, and PyTorch.. It's known for API, Deep Learning, Prototyping.
LlamaIndex (llms) is Data framework for LLM applications providing tools for ingesting, structuring, and accessing private or domain-specific data.. Users choose it for RAG, Data Framework, LLM.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Keras: Intuitive layer API, Multi-backend support, Pretrained applications
LlamaIndex: Data ingestion, Knowledge indexing, RAG applications

verdict: Both Keras and LlamaIndex are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Keras for API, LlamaIndex for RAG.
